name: D'Crossier - Flor de D’Crossier 512 Maduro - Hermosos No. 2
additionalNotes: The family of the Pure Aroma Cigars and the makers of D'Crossier Cigars, has blended this line. Flor de D'Crossier Selection 512 is a harmonious combination of only the best fillers and blenders from Costa Rica ad Dominican Republic. Using a tasty Sumatra and wrapped within an Ecuadorian Habano, to deliver an explosion in flavors.
